headline: MenuSifu Powers MIXUE's U.S. Expansion as Brand Becomes World's Largest Beverage Chain by Store Count
summary: MenuSifu, the leading restaurant technology provider serving Asian restaurants in the United States, today announced its ongoing partnership with MIXUE, as the beverage brand reaches a major global milestone: becoming the largest beverage chain in the world by number of locations, surpassing Starbucks and McDonald's with more than 47,000 stores worldwide.

content.title: MenuSifu Powers MIXUE's U.S. Expansion as Brand Becomes World's Largest Beverage Chain by Store Count
content.summary: MenuSifu, the leading restaurant technology provider serving Asian restaurants in the United States, today announced its ongoing partnership with MIXUE, as the beverage brand reaches a major global milestone: becoming the largest beverage chain in the world by number of locations, surpassing Starbucks and McDonald's with more than 47,000 stores worldwide.

thumbnail.caption: Logo for MIXUE, established in 1997, specializing in ice cream and tea.
